snippet.title: Infinite World Generation - The Documentary
snippet.description:
My name is Jesper and in this video I will take a closer look on how Infinite World Generation works, who intented it, what did change since than and how you can create your own worlds using procedual world generation

Videos like this take a lot of time to produce, which is why I depend on your support by subscribing, sharing, commenting and liking ^^

Join the TakeLime Discord: https://discord.gg/KzKSkJFURy

Become a part of my journey through the development of a game and get in contact with me on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TakeLime
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TakeLime
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/TakeLime
itch.io: https://TakeLime.itch.io/
